job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>**Fully remote Developer/Engineer Opportunities** </p><p><br></p><p><strong>Title:&nbsp;</strong>React/Angular Front End Developer</p><p> Full Stack Developer (Java &amp; JavaScript OR .NET &amp; JavaScript)</p><p> Back End Engineer (Java, Node or .NET)</p><p><strong>LOCATION:</strong>&nbsp;Remote</p><p><strong>PAY RATE:</strong>&nbsp;Market Rate</p><p><br></p><p><u>QUALIFICATIONS</u></p><ul><li><strong>Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Engineering (or similar degree program) is a must!</strong></li><li>3+ years' experience developing API's (REST API's) and building out microservices.</li><li>3+ years of backend programming experience with Java, Python and/or Go&nbsp;<em>(we are open for any of the above listed OOP languages).</em></li><li>3+ years of React or Angular Development</li></ul><p><br></p><p><u>OVERVIEW</u></p><p>Insight Global is hiring several Software Engineer positions nationwide. If any of the above qualifications fit your background we would love to connect further.</p>
